attributes.comment:
Please reconsider increasing filing fees for the adoption-related petitions and
applications: I-600/I-600A, N-565, and N-600 by such dramatic levels (an average
increase of 66%). As an adoptive parent, I know how expensive the adoption
process is. With the increase in some wait times (China now takes 16 months to
give a referral), we often incur additional fees when certain documents expire. The
proposed petition increases would be an additional, significant burden on many
families who are already engaged in a very expensive process. Thank you for your
consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Susan Sandler
